attributes.additional_details:
Great Britain should consider an option of creating a commonwealth union. Our commonwealth history is important to many nations across the world. The UK parliament should propose a joint union with the commonwealth. Using our sovereign monarch to lead this new nation. The government should invite the commonwealth for a summit in London to explain its plans.

The monarch is queen of many nations in the commonwealth so she should exercise her power and create a new Britain. An commonwealth Britain that is a  union. Most of the commonwealth use the parliamentary system. So in theory the countries of the commonwealth will became one giant parliament.
The government can ask its foreign office to debate the idea or ask the monarch on its opinion. God save the commonwealth and let us rival the US and the EU
